headline: Tenovi Expands Access to Glucose Data for Remote Patient Monitoring and Cardiometabolic Programs Through Dexcom Integration
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., July 23, 2025--Tenovi, a leading provider of remote patient monitoring (RPM) solutions, today announced it now supports Dexcom continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) data directly within its clinician-facing dashboard. This milestone expands Tenovi’s ability to support diabetes management programs across healthcare organizations by seamlessly displaying Dexcom CGM data within its existing virtual RPM infrastructure.
